scripts.all: pnpm clean-all && pnpm install-all && pnpm build-all && pnpm format-all && pnpm check-all && pnpm tests-all
scripts.clean-all: rm -rf node_modules web/dapp pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm -r clean
scripts.install-all: pnpm install && pnpm install-foundry && pnpm install-wordpress
scripts.build-all: pnpm build1 && pnpm build2 && pnpm build3
scripts.build3: pnpm -F svelte build && pnpm -F wordpress build
scripts.build-dapp: pnpm build1 && pnpm build2 && pnpm build3
scripts.build-plugin: pnpm build1 && pnpm build2 && pnpm build3
scripts.deploy-dapp: export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.foundry/bin && pnpm install && pnpm install-foundry && pnpm build-dapp
scripts.deploy-plugin: pnpm install && pnpm install-wordpress && pnpm build-plugin
